story.text: As a developer with over five years of experience and a passion for entrepreneurship, I enjoy transforming ideas into concrete products by combining strategy and technique. My goal is to support startups and scale-ups with sharp expertise and a pragmatic approach to evolve their products.

hero.name: HUGO BAYOUD
hero.title: Full Stack Web & Mobile Developer
hero.description: Specialized in the JavaScript ecosystem. Strong UX/UI sensitivity to create performant and intuitive applications.

projects.title: My projects
projects.subTitle: I create profitable applications and tools and help people with my skills.

lepto.title: Lepto
lepto.description: Automate repayments between friends when travelling, while avoiding the tensions associated with finances. The key challenge was to deliver a smoother, more intuitive experience than competitors such as Tricount, thanks to an optimised UI/UX.

sowhat.title: Sowhat
sowhat.description: A FinTech that leverages Open Finance to help users better manage their budget, savings, and assets. Simplicity, efficiency, and impact are the key principles.

mybus.title: Monkey Factory
mybus.description: Facilitating urban mobility by centralizing transportation methods (bikes, scooters, buses, carpooling...) within a single application. My role: integrating a high-performance route calculation system and optimizing the Back-end architecture in a mono-repo.

skills.title: My tools
skills.subTitle: The technologies and applications I use daily.

references.title: My references
references.subTitle: People talking about me/I talk about myself

leProgres.title: Le Progrès
leProgres.description: The newspaper "Le Progrès" interviewed us to talk about the Lepto application.

bfmLyon.title: BFM TV Lyon
bfmLyon.description: Raphaël Metro, my partner on the Sowhat application, was interviewed on BFM TV Lyon to talk live about our work.

podcast.title: Podcast
podcast.description: Invited to Fabien Serra's microphone on Tizy Media, I discuss my journey in development, FinTechs, and entrepreneurship.

header.title: Blog
header.subtitle: My articles and my reflections on web and mobile development.

blog.noPosts: No posts found. Please check back later.
